Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text:
Cozy pub with very good food, solid quality and friendly service!
My routine brunch place for at least once a month. Food are always very fresh, carefully made. Amazing bread! Staff are very friendly. Atmosphere‚Äôs nice and chilled. Gezellig üòª

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: Wonderfully located on the Kostverloenvaart gracht. It‚Äôs in Oud-West but further out from the Da Costabuurt. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: Great, cosy, and nice food, try the lamsschenkel very nice, nice terrace next to the water, nice location in old west

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: Bar Bistro Belleami is a great place to meet with friends and family. Children and pet friendly with a great atmosphere. A comprehensive food and drinks menu to suite all tastes! Enjoyed the atmosphere and the dining experience. Will return whenever I am in Amsterdam.

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: Cosy bar with great food, snacks and local beer. They do serve cheese platter from the KEF cheese shop, which is one of the best in the city. I always came here when it was raining (dear Amsterdam), but the outdoor terrasse seems lovely to spend afternoon in the sun.

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: This cosy bar by the waterfront is perfect for group gathering and celebrations! They have a wide number of drink options as well as some comfort food for individual plates or for sharing. The staff is super friendly and it's great value for money!

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: Nice and cozy place for having a drink during the week üëå!

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: One of the first places I visited after moving to Amsterdam and still one of my favourites. A huge terrace on a quiet street overlooking a canal and beautiful mosque. There‚Äôs also a cozy event space. Drinks and food are excellent. Perfect for a summer afternoon.

Review Text: The choice in coffee is quite basic, but the list of beers is broad. Seasonal dishes & drinks keep the menu interesting. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bar Bistro BelleAmi
Review Text: Super delicious food (good quality), perfect for a nice dinner or just for drinks. The dishes are also available in a smaller size which is affordable. Owners are very friendly and welcoming, service as it is supposed be. Recommended!
